text: mehi hetuva nam, niyata vasayenma movun veta (sadhakayangen) pæhædili eva samaga movunge dutayin pæmanemin tibuni. namut (ovunva) movun pratiksepa kara hæriyaha. ebævin allah movunva alla gatteya. niyata vasayenma ohu itamat balasampannayeku ha (papatarayinva) danduvam kirimehi itamat darunu kenekuda vanneya
